text:
Use cofunction identities and trig identities to find the indicated trig functions

\begin{array}{l}\n\sin 30^{\circ}=\frac{1}{2}, \tan 30^{\circ}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} \\\n\frac{0}{0} \cdot \cos 30^{\circ}=\n\end{array}[imath]\sin 30^{\circ}=\frac{1}{2}, \tan 30^{\circ}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} [/imath] [imath]\frac{0}{0} \cdot \cos 30^{\circ}=[/imath]
